Hi,
	Just worth mentioning that the one real-life example of something like 
this which uses big data is circuit-board/chip layout, and that's done by 
simulated annealing... they put corners in their adges, of course.

	You might want to limit node-positions to a grid, and edges to a smaller 
grid, anything like that makes a diagram easier on the eye...

	Ian Badcoe
